game.name: The Last Screening
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You find yourself inside a cinema hallway, ready to watch your film. The venue, however, has other plans for you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You find yourself inside a cinema hallway, ready to watch your film. The venue, however, has other plans for you.
